alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:27PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Big Horn and east central Park Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 327 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Meeteetse Rim, or 13 miles north of Meeteetse, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Big Horn and east central Park Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin
